This team made the dream possible , a season I‚Äôll never ever forget. We‚Äôve thoroughly enjoyed the ride over the last 2.5 months. This one is for the fans of rcb who never ever left our side in the worst of times. This one is for all the years of heartbreaks and disappointment. This is for every inch of effort left on the field playing for this team. As far as the ipl trophy is concerned- you‚Äôve made me wait 18 years to be able to lift you and celebrate my friend, but it‚Äôs been absolutely worth the wait. ‚ù§Ô∏è üèÜ@royalchallengers.bengaluru

It‚Äôs been 14 years since I first wore the baggy blue in Test cricket. Honestly, I never imagined the journey this format would take me on. It‚Äôs tested me, shaped me, and taught me lessons I‚Äôll carry for life.

There‚Äôs something deeply personal about playing in whites. The quiet grind, the long days, the small moments that no one sees but that stay with you forever.

As I step away from this format, it‚Äôs not easy ‚Äî but it feels right. I‚Äôve given it everything I had, and it‚Äôs given me back so much more than I could‚Äôve hoped for.

I‚Äôm walking away with a heart full of gratitude ‚Äî for the game, for the people I shared the field with, and for every single person who made me feel seen along the way.

I‚Äôll always look back at my Test career with a smile.

#269, signing off.
